entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
